channel.title: [317] changing the exp rate, mine is setup weird, can someone help me?

item.title: [317] changing the exp rate, mine is setup weird, can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_epic_scape owner of epic scape
item.description:
@owner_of_epic_scape wrote:

double TotalExp = (double)(XPrate*XPperhit*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
all my exp is set up like tat, does anyone know how i can change the exp rate to 600? right now its 300 per combat.

Read full topic
